tool.name: Select Values [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Selects the rows containing the label(s) of interest in a given annotation from the dataset.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "file", "name": "dataframe.csv"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --list-values Labels_of_Interest --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.select_values_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Dataset
param.label: Upstream Analysis
param.help: Link to prior processed analysis in the analysis.

param.name: Annotation_of_Interest
param.label: Annotation of Interest
param.help: Annotation of interest to select values from.

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: Label(s) of interest to include from the selected annotation.

tool.help: **Select Values [SPAC] [DMAP]** Selects the rows containing the label(s) of interest in a given annotation from the dataset.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation **Outputs:** - dataframe: file (dataframe.csv)
